lines.code: # Regular expressions-based rules for Italian word inflection:
lines.author: tom@organisms.be

lines.code: # Import Verbs base class and verb tenses.
lines.author: tom@organisms.be

lines.code: is_vowel = lambda ch: ch in VOWELS
lines.author: tom@organisms.be

lines.code: # Word starts with z or s + consonant?
lines.author: tom@organisms.be

lines.code: zs = lambda w: w and (w[:1] == "z" or (w[:1] == "s" and not is_vowel(w[1:2])))
lines.author: tom@organisms.be

lines.code: """ Returns the definite article for a given word.
lines.author: tom@organisms.be

lines.code: if PLURAL in gender and MALE in gender and (is_vowel(word[:1]) or zs(word)):
lines.author: tom@organisms.be

lines.code: if PLURAL not in gender and word and is_vowel(word[:1]):
lines.author: tom@organisms.be

lines.code: if PLURAL not in gender and MALE in gender and zs(word):
lines.author: tom@organisms.be

lines.code: return PLURAL in gender and "i" or "il"
lines.author: tom@organisms.be

lines.code: return PLURAL in gender and "le" or "la"
lines.author: tom@organisms.be

lines.code: """ Returns the indefinite article for a given word.
lines.author: tom@organisms.be

lines.code: if MALE in gender and zs(word):
lines.author: tom@organisms.be

lines.code: return PLURAL in gender and "degli" or "uno"
lines.author: tom@organisms.be

lines.code: return PLURAL in gender and "dei" or "un"
lines.author: tom@organisms.be

lines.code: if FEMALE in gender and is_vowel(word[:1]):
lines.author: tom@organisms.be

lines.code: return PLURAL in gender and "delle" or "un'"
lines.author: tom@organisms.be

lines.code: return PLURAL in gender and "delle" or "una"
lines.author: tom@organisms.be

lines.code: """ Returns the indefinite or definite article for the given word.
lines.author: tom@organisms.be

lines.code: """ Returns a string with the article + the word.
lines.author: tom@organisms.be

lines.code: """ Returns the gender for the given word, either:
lines.author: tom@organisms.be

lines.code: MALE, FEMALE, (MALE, FEMALE), (MALE, PLURAL) or (FEMALE, PLURAL).
lines.author: tom@organisms.be

lines.code: # Most nouns ending in -a (-e) are feminine, -o (-i) masculine:
lines.author: tom@organisms.be

lines.code: "braccio": "braccia", # bracci (arms of a lamp or cross)
lines.author: tom@organisms.be

lines.code: """ Returns the plural of a given word.
lines.author: tom@organisms.be

lines.code: if w.endswith(("cia", "gia")) and len(w) > 4 and not is_vowel(w[-4]):
lines.author: tom@organisms.be

lines.code: singular_irregular = dict((v, k) for k, v in plural_irregular.items())
